alert.note: Alert for Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Oklahoma and southwestern Logan Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Edmond. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edmond, Guthrie, Arcadia, Navina, Seward and Downtown Edmond. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 141 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
